post.summary: Creates a new carrier from the entity type given, with the right kind of properties, defaults set.

parameters.name: request
parameters.description: EntityType

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Optional comma separated list of properties to include in the result. Other fields are then nulled out to reduce payload size: "Name,department,category". Default = show all fields.

parameters.name: Accept-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code.

parameters.name: SO-Language
parameters.description: Convert string references and multi-language values into a specified language (iso2) code. Overrides Accept-Language value.

parameters.name: SO-Culture
parameters.description: Number, date formatting in a specified culture (iso2 language) code. Partially overrides SO-Language/Accept-Language value. Ignored if no Language set.

parameters.name: SO-TimeZone
parameters.description: Specify the timezone code that you would like date/time responses converted to.

parameters.name: SO-AppToken
parameters.description: The application token that identifies the partner app. Used when calling Online WebAPI from a server.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: CreateDefaultBoardViewSettingsFromEntityType: Creates a new carrier from the entity type given, with the right kind of properties, defaults set.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.BoardViewSettin.description:
Board view settings.
<para />
Carrier object for BoardViewSettingsBase.
Services for the BoardViewSettingsBase Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISelectionAgent">Selection Agent</see>.

EntityType.description: The kind of board view entity these settings belong to

AssociateId.description: The associate this board view settings belongs to (0 for all)

SelectionId.description: The selection this board view settings belongs to

HideEmptyGroups.description: Do not show groups with no members/elements if this is true

SortDesc.description: True if the sort is descending

Filters.description: Column names to filter on, comma separated

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: GetBoardViewSettings: Get BoardViewSettings by ID
GetBoardViewSettingsForSelection: Get BoardViewSettings by associate id and selection id
SaveBoardViewSettings: Save BoardViewSettings
SaveBoardViewSettingsForSelectionAndAssociate: Save BoardViewSettings on the given selection/associate
DeleteBoardViewSettings: Delete BoardViewSettings

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectionEntity.description:
Carrier object for SelectionEntity.
Services for the SelectionEntity Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISelectionAgent">Selection Agent</see>.

Description.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

Postit.description: The actual text, max 2047 significant characters even though it is stored as a larger data type on some databases

SelectionCategory.description:
Selection category type (list item) 
<para>Use MDO List name "searchCat" to get list items.</para>

GroupIdx.description: Original primary user group of associate

IncludePerson.description: 0 = Include first person, 1 = Include all persons, 2 = Include no persons

MemberCount.description: How many selectionmembers (for progress bar calculations) - estimate, -1 (or 4294967295) means we don't know

SoundEx.description: What the name sounds like, for duplicate detection

Source.description: How did we get this selection? For future integration needs

UpdatedCount.description: Number of updates made to this record

Visibility.description: Obsolete, but still maintained denormalization of visiblefor

CompanyUnique.description: Filter out duplicate members based on company?

TargetTableNumber.description: TargetTableNumber defines the type of selection members this selection contains. e.g. the table number for 'contact', or 'project' or 'sale'

TargetTableName.description: TargetTableName contains the name of the table in lowercase. defines the type of selection members this selection contains. e.g. 'contact', or 'project' or 'sale'

LeftSelectionId.description: LeftSelectionId is used in combination with RightSelectionId and CombinationType to define an union of two selections when SelectionType=Combined.

RightSelectionId.description: RightSelectionId  is used in combination with LeftSelectionId and CombinationType to define an union of two selections when SelectionType=Combined.

SelectionUnionType.description: How to combine the two selections when SelectionType = Combined.

MainProviderName.description: The name of the Archive Provider that will deliver the content of the archive - the actual entity rows

ShadowProviderName.description: The name, if relevant, of the Archive Provider that will deliver the Shadow rows: contact/person rows related to the actual entity. Can be blank, indicating that there is no shadow archive

ChartKey.description: ID/key of the last-used chart tile on this selection

LastLoaded.description: The date/time this selection was last loaded (selectionentity fetched)

LastLoadedByAssociate.description: Associate that last looked at the selection members; only date (not time) is valid

LastMembershipChange.description: The date/time the membership the selection last changed. Dynamic: change of criteria; Static: add/remove members; Combined: change of algorithm

LastMembershipChangeByAssociate.description: Associate that last changed the selection membership (static members, dynamic criteria, combined parameters); only date (not time) is valid

MainHeading.description: 'Static selection of Companies', or whatever else is appropriate, made by combining text resources for the type and the entity (plural form); this string will contain resource references

MemberTabHeading.description: 'Companies', or whatever else is appropriate - the plural form of the entity name; this string will contain resource references

MailingsProviderName.description: The name of the provider for the Mailings tab, if relevant; this string will contain resource references

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.description:
Carrier object for Associate.
Services for the Associate Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAssociateAgent">Associate Agent</see>.

Name.description: Initials, also login name, possibly database user name

PersonId.description:
Owning person record 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: User type - 1 = internal user, 2 = resource, 3 = external user, 4 = anonymous, 5 = system

GroupIdx.description: Primary group membership, see UserGroupLink for secondary memberships

FullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

FormalName.description: The associate's culture formatted formalname (firstname, middleName and lastname, title, mrmrs)

Deleted.description: If true, the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

EjUserId.description: ID of the ej user record corresponding to this associate; 0 for associates that are not ej users

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Associate.ExtraFields} and <see cref="!:UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.TableRight.description:
Wraps a table right together with an explanatory reason.
Code can indicate why access is restricted.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldProperty.description: Class holding properties like field length, field type about a field in the carrier.

SuperOffice.CRM.Security.FieldRight.description:
Wraps the field right together with an explanatory reason.
Also adds logical operators to the field rights so that they can be easily combined.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectionCatego.description:
Carrier object for SelectionCategory.
Services for the SelectionCategory Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IListAgent">List Agent</see>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: CreateSelectionEntity: Create (but do not save) a new selection entity, for the current user and the given target table; other fields populated as by CreateDefaultSelectionEntity()
CreateContactSelectionFromSelection: Creates a new selection based on selection members from an existing selection.
CreateTemporaryContactSelectionFromContactPersonIds: Creates a temporary selection with members from a collection of ContactPerson id's.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ContactPersonId.description:
Class representing an ContactPersonId carrier used for storing either a person id or a contact id. If PersonId contains an id, ContactId will be 0, and the other way around.
<para />
Carrier object for ContactPersonId.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: CopyContactSelectionMembers: Copy contact selection members from selection into an existing selection.
GetRecipientStatistics: Returns a RecipientStatistics object with a count of addresses, emailaddresses and emailaddresses.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecipientStatis.description:
Class representing a RecipientStatistics carrier used for counting attributes on selection members.
<para />
Carrier object for RecipientStatistics.

ValidPostalAddresses.description: Number of members with a valid postal address.

ValidEmailAddresses.description: Number of members with a valid email address.

ValidFaxNumbers.description: Number of members with a valid fax number.

NoAddresses.description: Number of members with an invalid address.

NoFaxOrEmails.description: Number of members with no fax or email address.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: GetRecipientStatisticsFromProjectMembers: Returns a RecipientStatistics object with a count of addresses, emailaddresses and emailaddresses based on members in a project.

GetRecipientStatisticsFromContactPersonIds: Returns a RecipientStatistics object with a count of addresses, emailaddresses and emailaddresses based on contact and persons in a collection of ContactPersonId.
AddContactSelectionMembers: Adds the collection of ContactPersonId as members to the static selection
RemoveContactSelectionMembers: Removes members from the selection as  specified in the collection of ContactPersonId.

AddContactSelectionMembersFromSearch: Adds members to the selection from the search result.
RemoveContactSelectionMembersFromSearch: Removes members from the selection using the search result.
CreateTemporaryContactSelectionFromSelectionMemberIds: Creates a temporary selection with members from a collection of selectionmember id's.
AddRemoveContactSelectionMemberInterests: Adds or removes interests on companies and persons in a selection.
EditContactSelectionMemberDetails: Edit company and contact details in a selection based on contents in selectionMemberEditValues.

CompanyBusiness.description: Contains new value for company business.

CompanyDepartment.description: Contains new value for the company department.

CompanyNumber.description: Contains new value for the company number.

CompanyCode.description: Contains new value for the company code.

ContactPosition.description: Contains new value for the contact position.

ChangeCompanyCategory.description: If true, the category of the company will be changed.

ChangeCompanyBusiness.description: If true, the business of the company will change.

ChangeCompanyOurContact.description: If true, the our contact of the company will change.

ChangeCompanyDepartment.description: If true, the department of the company will change.

ChangeCompanyNumber.description: If true, the number of the company will change.

ChangeCompanyCode.description: If true, the code of the company will change.

ChangeContactPosition.description: If true, the position of the contact will change.

CompanyCountry.description: Contains new value for the company country.

ChangeCompanyCountry.description: If true, the country of the company will change.

ContactJobTitle.description: Contains new value for the contact VAT number.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: GenerateFollowUps: Generate follow-ups for members in the selection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AppointmentEnti.description: Partial AppointmentEntity class associating the generated AppointmentEntity with an interface.

Associate.description:
The owner of the appointment - the associate whose diary/checklist the appointment is in. 
<para>Use MDO List name "associate" to get list items.</para>

Contact.description:
The contact associated with the appointment. It may also be null if no contact is associated with the appointment. 
<para>Use MDO List name "contact_new" to get list items.</para>

CreatedBy.description: The associate that first created the appointment. The property is read-only.

UpdatedBy.description: The person that last updated the appointment.

InvitedPerson.description: If the appointment is a booking, the invited persons may be your associates, but you are also able to invite contact persons from other companies to join your meeting. They do not receive an invitation, unless you send them one by email, but you can see in the appointment that persons other than your associates have been invited to a meeting. Each invited person will have an appointment slave record.

Person.description:
An appointment may also be connected to a person; this must be a contact person registered on the current company. This does not mean however that a person is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "person" to get list items.</para>

MotherId.description: ID of mother appointment; self if booking master, master ID if booking slave, 0 if normal appointment. However, if 0 and assoc_id != reg_id then this is an assigned appointment, indicated vt type = kBooking

Priority.description:
It's possible to give appointments different priorities. All the different priority types are saved in the priority table, and edited from the Admin. Client. An appointment does not require a priority. 
<para>Use MDO List name "priority" to get list items.</para>

Private.description: The confidentiality of appointments is shown as different types of private on the appointment. For an updated list of private types, see the database manual.

Project.description:
An appointment may also be connected to a project, so you see the appointment both on the company card, and on the project card. This does not mean however that a project is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "project" to get list items.</para>

Type.description: The different types of appointment, if the appointment is supposed to be shown in the diary or checklist, or if it's a document. See the different types of appointments in the database manual.

Completed.description: Appointment Completed state. This property is the part of the Status property that is the completed state. Could be three state if the three state user preference is set.

ActiveLinks.description: Number of active links to sale, document, appointment.

Links.description: List of all elements linked to the appointment.

HasAlarm.description: Does this appointment have an alarm

ColorIndex.description: Appointment colour, used only in Japanese versions. Western versions take colour from Task

IsFree.description: True if free, false if busy

LagTime.description: as leadtime, but after the end - time blocked for travel etc.

Location.description: Location for appointment, defaulted from invited resource of type place and other rules, but you can write anything you want here

RejectCounter.description: How many invitees have rejected this appointment

RejectReason.description:
Why was this booking or assignment rejected, the RejectReason list is a source of suggestions but you can write anything here 
<para>Use MDO List name "rejectReason" to get list items.</para>

Participants.description: List of id's of the participants to this appointment.

AssignmentStatus.description: Status if this appointment is in the process of being assigned to someone else

InvitationStatus.description: Status if this appointment represents an invitation

BookingType.description: The type of booking the appointment represents

ActiveDate.description: The date to be used for searching & showing

HasConflict.description: Does the appointment overlap with another appointment in the user's diary?

AssignedBy.description: Who assigned this appointment to this user? Whose diary did the appointment come from?

MotherAssociate.description: The owner of the mother appointment - the associate whose diary/checklist the mother appointment is in.  The mother appointment is the one identified by the mother_id. If the mother_id is 0 or the same as this appointment_id, then the master associate will be the same as the 'ordinary' associate.

Task.description:
Task comprises the different types of activities, like Phone call, Meeting and so on. 
<para>Use MDO List name "task" to get list items.</para>

Sale.description:
An appointment may also be connected to a sale, so you see the appointment on the company card, on the project card and on the sale card. This does not mean however that a sale is required. 
<para>Use MDO List name "sale" to get list items.</para>

SuggestedAppointmentId.description: Suggested guide item that this appointment is an instance of (Note: NOT VALID for document-type appointments, they have their own link)

CautionWarning.description: Status field to indicate appointments that have some sort of problem

OwnedExternally.description: Set if an external system owns this appointment.

JoinVideomeetUrl.description: Blank when not a video meeting. Filled with Join Meeting URL when created.

CentralserviceVideomeetId.description: GUID for video meeting in central services  this is set when we create meetings from SuperOffice. It is blank for incoming meetings created from inbox.

UserDefinedFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AppointmentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Dictionary of user defined field data.
The key string is the ProgId of the UdefField, or if the ProgId is empty it is a string of the format "SuperOffice:[UdefFieldIdentity]", e.g. "SuperOffice:1234"

ExtraFields.description:
Deprecated: Use {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AppointmentEntity.CustomFields} instead.
Extra fields added to the carrier. This could be data from Plug-ins, the foreign key system, external applications, etc.

CustomFields.description:
Udef + Extra fields added to the carrier. Extra fields as defined by changes to database schema + user-defined fields as defined by admin.
Custom fields combines user defined fields and extra fields into one bucket. 
The individual {SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AppointmentEntity.ExtraFields} and <see cref="P:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.AppointmentEntity.UserDefinedFields">UserDefinedFields</see> properties are deprecated in favor of this
combined collection.

VisibleFor.description: The set of users or groups the record is visible for

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Contact.description:
Carrier object for Contact.
Services for the Contact Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IContactAgent">Contact Agent</see>.

URL.description: The internet address to this contact

Kananame.description: Contact kana name, used in Japanese versions only

AssociateFullName.description: The associate's culture formatted fullname (firstname, middleName and lastname)

CountryName.description: Name of country in installed language

Address.description: Contact address as  a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data. Suitable for passing to an address control for display.

FormattedAddress.description: The contact's address, formatted with linebreaks and spaces into a single string.

IsOwnerContact.description: Is the contact an owner contact.  This means that all persons on this contact can on only be internal users and not external users.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Address.description:
Street and/or Postal address, in both formatted and structured forms. You only need to modify one of the two for the change to be registered.
<para />
Carrier object for Address.

Wgs84Latitude.description: Latitude (that's north/south), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 59.91892. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

Wgs84Longitude.description: Longitude (that's East/west), decimal degrees, relative to WGS 84 ellipsoid. SuperOffice ASA is at 10.73159. This value needs no further grid reference or other qualifying information.

LocalizedAddress.description: LocalizedFieldArray is a list of LocalizedFieldList objects. Used to store localized information such as formatted address data.

Street.description: Street address (company street, person address, delivery address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Postal.description: Postal address (company postal, billing address). LocalizedAddress changes override this property, so you do not have to change both Localized and this.

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. Combines street and postal into one string. e.g.: <c>"Postboks 123,
Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Postbox 123,
Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
East Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.LocalizedField.description:
LocalizedField is used to store localized information such as formatted address data, a formatted phone number, etc.
<para />
Carrier object for LocalizedField.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.StructuredAddre.description:
Address with structured fields (Address1, City, Zip) - does not vary its layout by country, unliked the formatted address.
<para />
Carrier object for StructuredAddress.

AtypeIdx.description: Bit mask, combines address type (EAddressType) and owner type (EOwnerType)

Formatted.description:
Read-only formatted address multi-line string. e.g.: <c>"Brugata 123,
1234 OSLO
"</c> or <c>"Bridgelane 123,
West Tooting,
The Shire ES2 W31
"</c>.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Person.description:
Carrier object for Person.
Services for the Person Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IPersonAgent">Person Agent</see>.

Position.description: The position. This is a predefined SuperOffice value, different from Title

FullName.description: Get the persons full name (internal name used in clients for employees).

DirectPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the contact person.

FormalName.description: Get formal name for a person, as used in labels. (Full name + person title + academic title)

Retired.description: 1 = the user is retired and should have no rights, not appear in lists, etc.

Rank.description: Display sort sequence for default sort order

ActiveInterests.description: Number of records in pintr table; select count(*) from pintr pi where pi.person_id = this.person_id == activeInterests is always true

FaxPhone.description: Returns the fax phone that belong to the contact person.

MobilePhone.description: Returns the mobile phone that belong to the contact person.

ContactPhone.description: Returns the direct phone that belong to the persons contact.

AssociateId.description: Id of the item's owner (Associate id)

UsePersonAddress.description: If 1, use person's address for mailing instead of company address

ContactFax.description: Actual phone number as eneterd by the user

Kanafname.description: Kana first name, used in Japanese versions only

Kanalname.description: Kana last name, used in Japanese versions only

Post1.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post2.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

Post3.description: Postal address, used in Japanese versions only

ActiveErpLinks.description: How many active ERP links are there for this person?

SupportAssociateId.description: Our support contact for this person

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceInfo.description: Class representing the recurrence of an appointment booking

StartDate.description: Start date of the repetition pattern

EndDate.description:
End date of the repetition pattern
Only used when the end is calculated from a end date. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrenceEndType.EndDate}

RecurrenceCounter.description:
Number of recurrences
Only used when the end is calculated from a number of repetitions. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrenceEndType.Counter}

RecurrenceEndType.description: Type defining how the end of the recurrence sequence should be calculated

Pattern.description: The recurrence pattern (Daily, Weekly, Monthly, Yearly, Custom)

DayPattern.description:
Pattern describing a daily recurrence
Only set when the recurrence pattern i daily. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrencePattern.Daily}

WeekPattern.description:
Pattern describing a daily recurrence
Only set when the recurrence pattern i weekly. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrencePattern.Weekly}

MonthPattern.description:
Pattern describing a daily recurrence
Only set when the recurrence pattern i monthly. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrencePattern.Monthly}

YearPattern.description:
Pattern describing a daily recurrence
Only set when the recurrence pattern i yearly. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrencePattern.Yearly}

Dates.description: List of all dates where this recurrence occurs

IsRecurrence.description: Get a or set IsRecurrence, indicating if this is a repeating appointment or not.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceDayPa.description: Class representing a pattern for daily recurrence

Pattern.description: The type of daily recurrence pattern

Cycle.description:
The number of days between each recurrence.
Only used when the cyclic pattern occurs. {SuperOffice.Data.RecurrenceDailyPattern.EveryCyclicDay}

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceWeekP.description: Class representing a pattern for weekly recurrence

Weekdays.description: The weekdays the recurrence should occur for

Cycle.description: The number of weeks between each repetition

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceMonth.description: Class representing a pattern for monthly recurrence

Pattern.description: The type of monthly recurrence pattern

Cycle.description: The number of months between each repetition

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceYearP.description: Class representing a pattern for yearly recurrence

Pattern.description: The type of yearly recurrence pattern

Cycle.description: The month of the year where the recurrence occurs. 1 is January and 12 is December.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.RecurrenceDate.description: Class representing a Date for recurrence.

IsConflict.description: Is there a conflict for this occurrence.

Description.description: Conflict or day (e.g. red, blue, etc. letter-day) name.

DescriptionStyleHint.description: Style hint for the description (i.e. red for red-letter-days)

Tooltip.description: Description of conflict or other things happening this day.

AssociateId.description: Associate id of the participant if the participant is an associate (or resource)

PersonId.description: Person id of the participant if the participant is a person

ContactId.description: Contact id of the participant if the participant is an associate or person

EmailId.description: The email id of the email belonging to the appointment record belonging to this person

SendEmail.description: True if the participant has been sent an email or should be sent an email

InvitationStatus.description: The participant status for the appointment

EmailAddress.description: The email address to be used as a participant if neither person id nor associate id has been set.

Description.description: Description added for the email address participant, added to the email-table's description field if present.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.TaskListItem.description:
Carrier object for TaskListItem.
Services for the TaskListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IAppointmentAgent">Appointment Agent</see>.

Type.description: 1 = app, 2 = doc, 3 = email, 4 = fax, 5 = phone, 6 = todo - see EAppntRecordTypes

Deleted.description: If true, the Task list item is deleted

IntentId.description: Link to the intention of this kind of task (used by SAINT)

IsDefaultFree.description: True if free, false if busy

DefaultVideomeetingStatus.description: Default video-meeting status for meetings created in SuperOffice CRM.

TZLocationCode.description:
Code associated with location: UTC, AR-NQ, AU-QLD, PF2A
Not the an ISO country code. Unique.

TZLocationCities.description: Cities associated with location: Oslo, London, Rio de Janeiro

IsoNumber.description: Country ISO code associated with location: 578

TimeZoneDSTRules.description: Dictionary of Daylight saving time rules

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.Sale.description:
Carrier object for Sale.
Services for the Sale Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISaleAgent">Sale Agent</see>.

Probability.description: Actual probability, may differ from the one in the list

Currency.description: Currency the sale was made in.

Status.description: The sale's status, indicating wether the sale is open, sold or lost.

PersonFullName.description: The name of the person this sale belongs to.

Completed.description: The Sale completed state. The completed state is either Started or Completed. NotStarted is treated as Started. The value maps to the Done database field.

ActiveErpLinks.description: The number of active erp links

NextDueDate.description: Next due date, this is a denormalization of 'closest future activity date, or most recent if no future activities'. Maintained by the system, but very convenient for searching.

DeleteContacts: Deletes all contacts from a selection. If a contact does not have delete rights, it will be skipped.
AddSelectionMembers: Add selection members to a static selection of type others than contacts.
RemoveSelectionMembers: Removes members from the selection as  specified in the collection of entity ids. The ids are selection member ids (selection member primary key)
RemoveSelectionMembersById: Removes members from the selection as specified in the collection of entity ids. The ids can be a collection of sale ids, or other supported types.
AddSelectionMembersFromSearch: Adds members from the selection using the search result.
RemoveSelectionMembersFromSearch: Removes members from the selection using the search result.
CopySelectionMembers: Copy selection members from selection into an existing selection.
CreateTemporarySelectionFromIds: Creates a temporary selection with members from a collection of entity id's.
CreateSelectionFromSelection: Creates a new selection based on selection members from an existing selection.

CreateContactSelectionFromShadowSelection: Creates a new contact selection based on contact selection members from an existing shadow sale, appointment, project or document selection. The new selection will always be static even if the original selection is dynamic.
DeleteEntities: Deletes all entities from a selection. If an entity does not have delete rights, it will be skipped.
GetParentCombinedSelections: Get a list of all selection ids where the given selection is used to create a combined selection.
GetSelectionMembersArchiveRows: Get the list of members in this selection. The type of members depends on the target table of the selection.

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ArchiveListItem.description:
Carrier object for ArchiveListItem.
Services for the ArchiveListItem Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.IArchiveAgent">Archive Agent</see>.

EntityName.description: The entity name of the ArchiveListItem. An ArchiveList may contain rows from different entities.

PrimaryKey.description: The  primary key for the row

ColumnData.description: Dictionary of column name - column data items. Each column data item contains a display value, a tooltip hint, a link hint, and an orderby value. <para/>The display value is encoded by the CultureDataFormatter and can be decoded / localized by that class; all other values are optional. <para/>Tooltip hints can be passed to the TooltipProvider (Tooltip service) to be translated into an actual tootip.

LinkHint.description: Link hint for the row, indicating things like navigation links that can be presented as clickable hyperlinks

StyleHint.description: Style hint for the row, for instance 'retired' for associates or 'private' for appointments. Presentation layers can interpret the style hints as they see fit.

FieldProperties.description: Field property dictionary mapping field names to field access rights.

SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveColu.description:
Data carrier class for an item (cell) in an archive. This class contains properties and
members for three distinct values: The (visible) display value; the tooltip hint, and the link hint.

DisplayValue.description:
The visible display value for an archive cell. It is always a string, and other data types
are converted to string according to the invariant culture. Further conversion to the local
culture is the responsibility of the client.

TooltipHint.description:
The tooltip hint is either a text to be shown (after resource tag substitution), or a tooltip
key to be given to the tooltip provider system in order to asynchronoously retrieve the actual
tooltip.

LinkHint.description:
The link hint consists of information to construct an actual link; additional information (such
as a view context) must be provided by the client, who is also responsible for building the link.
The content of the link will generally be one or more ids, such as contact_id=123.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: GetSelectionShadowMembersArchiveRows: Get the list of members in this selection's shadow (i.e. the list of contacts + persons referenced in the main selection).
GetDynamicSelectionCriteria: Get the criteria for this dynamic selection.

SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveRest.description: This class carries information about a restriction on the query of an archive provider

Name.description: The programmatic column name, including any required prefixes

DisplayValues.description:
Display representation of value(s) - list ID's are decoded to display texts, other values are represented in a format
suitable for decoding and display through the {SuperOffice.CRM.Globalization.CultureDataFormatter}.

ColumnInfo.description: Optional complete ArchiveColumnInfo for this restriction; in that case, ColumnInfo.Name == this.Name will always be true

IsActive.description: Is this restriction active?  Inactive restrictions will not influence the generated query

SubRestrictions.description: Optional collection of sub criteria, usually null but set for Saint counter fields

InterParenthesis.description:
Get or set the parenthesis (if any) associated with this restriction. Positive values indicate a number
of opening parentheses (deepening nesting level), while negative numbers indicate closing parentheses.
Zero means no change in nesting level (no parentheses).

InterOperator.description:
Get or set the inter-restriction operator that describes how this
restriction is related to the next one in an array.
Default for new ArchiveRestrictionInfo objects is And

SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveColu.description:
This class carries information about the definition and properties of an archive display column. It is used by the archive
MDO providers to construct column lists for the configuration dialogs, and by the archive control to know what type
(and other properties) each column has. The class is serializable and used on both the application
and Web server sides.

DisplayName.description: The column name to show, can be a resource identifier string

DisplayTooltip.description: The column tooltip, used in the column list and in the column headings

DisplayType.description:
Type of column, so that the archive knows how to display it (actual display values are always strings, invariant-culture formatted).
This name can contain resource tags.

CanOrderBy.description: Can this column be used for sorting?

Name.description:
Unique identity of this column (in this particular context); the name to be used when requesting the column from a provider,
setting restrictions or order by criteria

CanRestrictBy.description: Can this column be used as a restriction

RestrictionType.description: The data type of the restriction; use this to retrieve the legal operators for the restriction

RestrictionListName.description: If the restriction data type is 'list', this property contains the name of the SoList so that choices can be shown

IsVisible.description: Is this column visible to the user in configuration dialogs etc

ExtraInfo.description: Example: "navigator" -> Should this column be mapped to a hyperlinked navigator text type?

Width.description:
The width specification, if the column info has been extended with GUI-based information.
It is either "n%" or "nc", where n is an integer. Percent-formatted fields grow and shrink; number-of-characters
formatted fields have constant width when the whole archive width changes.

IconHint.description:
Icon hint corresponding to the display name; this icon hint is used in the configuration dialog
and other places where we 'talk about' the columns of the archive. The actual heading
of the archive may also contain icons in lieu of textual names, the icon hint for that
is specified in {SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveColumnInfo.HeadingIconHint} and is a different one.

HeadingIconHint.description:
Icon hint for the archive heading only. If this is a nonempty string, the archive header
should use this icon and ignore the {SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveColumnInfo.DisplayName}. Otherwise, the DisplayName
should be used as the heading.

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: SetDynamicSelectionCriteria: Update the criteria for this dynamic selection. Replaces existing criteria with the new values.
SetDynamicSelectionCriteria2: Update the criteria for this dynamic selection using string. Criteria are parsed from the OData filter form: ''name startswith 'foo' and category in (1,2,3)''

SetDynamicSelectionCriteria3: Update the criteria for this dynamic selection. Use criteria as either restriction objects or OData string format. Criteria are parsed from the OData filter form: ''name startswith 'foo' and category in (1,2,3)''
DeletePersons: Deletes all persons from a selection. If a person does not have delete rights, it will be skipped.
GetDynamicSelectionCriteriaGroups: Get the criteria for this dynamic selection. This call supports multiple criteria groups.

SuperOffice.CRM.ArchiveLists.ArchiveRest.description: This class carries information about a group of restrictions

SuperOffice.WebApi.v1.Carriers.Selection.description: SetDynamicSelectionCriteriaGroups: Update the criteria for this dynamic selection. Replaces existing criteria with the new values. This call supports multiple criteria groups.
DeleteSelectionEntity: Deletes the SelectionEntity
GetSelectionForFind: Obtain a selection for the given entity, for the current user, of type WorkingSetForFind. Optionally populate criteria from the TypicalSearches system

SuperOffice.CRM.Services.SelectionForFin.description:
Provider name and selection id for a Find temporary selection
<para />
Carrier object for SelectionForFind.
Services for the SelectionForFind Carrier is available from the <see cref="T:SuperOffice.CRM.Services.ISelectionAgent">Selection Agent</see>.

ProviderName.description: The name of the Archive Provider to use when working with this selection; this is the main entity provider, never Shadow, Combined or anything else fancy

MainHeading.description: 'Sale', intended for the main headings in the Find front page; this string will contain resource references

SuperOffice Password.description:
SuperOffice username:password are passed in Base64-encoded. 

You can also pass inn an unencoded ticket 7T:abc== with the HTTP Authenticate header.

SuperId Authentication.description:
SuperOffice SuperId OAuth implicit flow. 
You need to issue a request to the SuperId authorization URL
    https://online.superoffice.com/login/common/oauth/authorize?response_type=token
      &client_id=670734e0-4c5a-11e3-be9e-a171392e81db
      &redirect_uri=https://example.com/spa/

passing in the application id and redirect URL.

SuperId will log the user in, and redirect to the requested redirect URL with a #payload
containing the access token and claims. (The redirect URL must be registered with SuperId in advance)

   https://example.com/spa#access_token=8A%3aCust12227.AXRrCITpPBvQX3UbIohb
      &token_type=bearer
      &state=
      &expires_in=3600
      &ctx=Cust12227
      &netserver_url=https%3a%2f%2fsod.superoffice.com%2fCust12227%2fRemote%2fServices82%2f

You can take the #access_token value and pass it as the Authenticate HTTP header as a BEARER token.
